meanings.sent1: After being sick, the child experienced anorexy and didn't want to eat.
meanings.sent2: The patient's anorexy was a concern for the doctor.
meanings.sent3: The anorexy of the picky eater led to creative meal planning in the family.
meanings.sent4: The anorexy of the plant during the dry season showed the importance of watering.
meanings.sent5: The anorexy of the cat for its usual food made the owner try different treats.

meanings.definition: Anorexia nervosa: an eating disorder characterized by an abnormally low body weight, intense fear of gaining weight, and a distorted body image.
meanings.sent1: She sought help for her anorexy and started therapy sessions.
meanings.sent2: Anorexy can have serious health consequences if not treated.
meanings.sent3: The anorexy of the fashion model was a topic of concern among her friends.
meanings.sent4: The anorexy of the mirror reflected back a distorted image of herself.
meanings.sent5: His anorexy for perfection in his work made him overlook his achievements.
